extra.enrollment_requirement:
EXCLUSION    No more than 1 course from ARTF101; ARTF105; ARTF 106; ARTF127.		
EXCLUSION    No more than 1 course from ARTF101; ARTF 105/6.0; 106/3.0; ARTF 128/6.0.

basic.description:
An exploration, through the processes of drawing and painting, of a wide variety of visual problems encountered by the contemporary artist. 
NOTE    Not available for credit towards a B.F.A. program.
NOTE    Offered only at the Bader International Study Centre, Herstmonceux, in Summer Term.
NOTE    Materials: estimated cost $200.
basic.subject: ARTF
basic.title: Introductory Fine Art (Drawing and Painting)
